invite-to-partup-popup-title: Invite people to join your part-up
invite-to-partup-popup-explaination: You might want to work with someone you know, but who is not an upper yet. Here you can invite them to become upper and join your part-up. We drafted an invitation email for you. Add your personal note and send it!
invite-to-partup-popup-placeholder-expla: Don't worry about the [name] and [url] values in the invitation letter. These will be replaced automatically with the correct values.
invite-to-partup-popup-message-prefill:
Hi [name],

On Part-up, I found this cool part-up for you to join: "__partupName__". I believe you could fit the team well. You can check out the part-up using this link [url] and introduce yourself to the team.

Haven't heard about Part-up? It is the new marketplace for teamwork. Part-up gets you your best team for the job. Just share your dream or talent and Part-up helps you find the right team! You are free to choose what you work on and who you work with. Together you decide on the activities and what each will contribute. You build your profile and show the world what you're good at!

Let's part-up!

Cheers,
__inviterName__
